channel.title: The Totally Rad Show
channel.description: THE TOTALLY RAD SHOW. Hosted by Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg and Jeff Cannata. The Totally Rad Show is the summer blockbuster of geek news shows. Every week, hosts Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, and Jeff Cannata rip into the world of movies, video games, tv, comics, and more and pull out what's rad.

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 760: The Totally Rad Show - Final Episode
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 760: The Totally Rad Show - Final Episode

Plus, we go hands-on with Call of Duty: Black Ops multiplayer. And be sure to stick around to the end of the episode for some GIANT NEWS about TRS!

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 5: Bubo
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 5: Bubo

description.span: This week: News of remakes and revamps galore, including Clash of the Titans, the Hulk, and Street Fighter II. Plus, we check in with each of the guys' current gaming adventures, and get a real life lesson! It's The Totally Rad Show Episode 5: "Bubo" The one in which Alex re-joins the Rebel Alliance, Jeff gets a daughter, Dan recollects his rad, and we all play Tecmo Bowl.

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 4: Double-Duffed
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 4: Double-Duffed

description.span: This week: A review of Hot Fuzz, news of Goyer's next super hero flick, impressions of Super Paper Mario and the Opera browser for the Wii, and our take on GH DLC. Plus, the TV segment debuts with discussion of Battlestar Galactica, Sopranos, and Thank God You're Here, and the forum question rundown returns! It's The Totally Rad Show Episode 4: "Double-Duffed" The one in which Jeff remembers Kurt, Alex gets Grindhoused, Dan is proven right, and we all know what time it is.
description.br: Topics: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 3: The Yang
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 3: The Yang

description.span: This week: A balls-to-the-wall review of Grindhouse, socks rockin' impressions of Guitar Hero 2 for Xbox 360, and news of MTV's Rock Band. Plus, we can't stop playing Puzzle Quest, and green couch debunked! It's The Totally Rad Show Episode 3: "The Yang" The one in which Dan wonders if Combat really Evolved, Jeff sleeps naked, Alex's voice reaches new heights, and we all enjoy full slabs of delicious baby back ribs.
description.br: Topics: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata

item.media:keywords: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 2: Die-Curious
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 2: Die-Curious

description.span: This week: A review of The Lookout and an analysis of the trailer for Stardust, our impressions of the DS, PSP, and PC game Puzzle Quest: Challenge of the Warlords, and the GTA IV teaser. Plus, is Nintendo right about the Wii? And the origin story of TRS revealed! It's The Totally Rad Show Episode 2: "Die-Curious" The one in which Alex's porridge is just right, Dan is tempted by the dark side, Jeff loves his mommy, and we all get Trapper Keepers.

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 1: Trumors
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 1: Trumors

description.span: This week: reviews of the Aqua Teen Hunger Force movie and Cooking Mama: Cook Off for the Wii, discussion of John Carpenter's gaming habits, the Gears of War film, the Xbox Elite, Ratchet and Clank Future: Tools of Destruction, and more, and we answer viewer questions from before the first show has even aired! It's the Totally Rad Show Episode 1: "Trumors".
